description.zh-cn: 中国女高音歌唱家、歌剧表演艺术家，现任中华人民共和国最高领导人习近平的夫人。
description.en: Chinese contemporary folk singer and operatic soprano, and the wife of Xi Jinping, the current paramount leader of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，自2012年起担任中国共产党中央委员会总书记和中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who has served as the General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China since 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国创始人毛泽东的第四任妻子。她在文化大革命期间成为四人帮的核心成员。
description.en: Chinese politician and the fourth wife of Mao Zedong, the founder of the People's Republic of China. She was a key member of the Gang of Four during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的创始人和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, the founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物华国锋的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Chinese politician Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，毛泽东逝世后的中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China after Mao Zedong's death.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人邓小平的第三任妻子。
description.en: Third wife of Deng Xiaoping, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家，中华人民共和国的第二代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary and politician who was the second-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人江泽民的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Jiang Zemin, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中华人民共和国的第三代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the third-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人胡锦涛的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Hu Jintao, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中华人民共和国的第四代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese politician who was the fourth-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物刘少奇的夫人，曾作为第一夫人数次陪同刘少奇出访。
description.en: Wife of Chinese politician Liu Shaoqi, who accompanied him on several state visits as the first lady.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China and was purged and died during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物董必武的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Chinese politician Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国代主席。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Acting Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席李先念的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Li Xiannian, former President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席杨尚昆的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Yang Shangkun, former President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、社会活动家，孙中山的夫人。中华人民共和国成立后，曾担任中华人民共和国名誉主席。
description.en: Chinese politician and social activist, wife of Sun Yat-sen. After the founding of the People's Republic of China, she served as the Honorary President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命的伟大先行者，中华民国的国父。
description.en: A great pioneer of China's modern democratic revolution and the founding father of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一配偶
en: First Spouse of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国最高领导人或国家元首配偶的非官方称谓。
description.en: An unofficial title for the spouse of the paramount leader or head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，自1949年成立以来由中国共产党一党专政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, ruled by the Chinese Communist Party as a single-party state since its establishment in 1949.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人
en: Paramount leader of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治中拥有最高权力和权威的领导人的非官方称谓。
description.en: An unofficial title for the political leader with the highest power and authority in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家元首

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首
en: Head of state of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家代表，根据不同时期的宪法，该职位由不同职务承担。
description.en: The state representative of the People's Republic of China; depending on the constitution of different periods, this role has been held by different positions.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市西城区的建筑群，是中国共产党中央委员会和中华人民共和国国务院的办公所在地，也是中华人民共和国最高领导人的非正式官邸。
description.en: A complex of buildings in Xicheng District, Beijing, China, which serves as the central headquarters for the Chinese Communist Party and the State Council of the People's Republic of China. It is also the unofficial residence of the paramount leader of China.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，由总理领导的国务院及其下属各部门组成。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, consisting of the State Council led by the Premier and its subordinate departments.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家通讯社新华社主办的官方新闻网站。
description.en: The official news website run by Xinhua News Agency, the state news agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会机关报《人民日报》建设的大型网上信息交互平台。
description.en: A large-scale online information exchange platform established by People's Daily, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党中央委员会机关报《人民日报》社主办与主管的国际新闻报纸。
description.en: An international news newspaper sponsored and supervised by the People's Daily, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 位于山东的戏剧教育机构，江青曾在此学习。
description.en: A drama educational institution in Shandong where Jiang Qing once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期创办的干部教育学校，卓琳曾在此学习。
description.en: A cadre training school founded by the Chinese Communist Party during the Yan'an period, where Zhuo Lin once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所高等外语学府，王冶坪的母校。
description.en: An institution of higher education in foreign languages located in Shanghai, China, and the alma mater of Wang Yeping.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所顶尖综合性研究型大学，刘永清的母校。
description.en: A top comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等音乐学府，彭丽媛的母校。
description.en: An institution of higher education in music located in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Peng Liyuan.

description.zh-cn: 一所天主教大学，王光美曾就读于其在北京的时期。
description.en: A Catholic university, where Wang Guangmei studied during its time in Beijing.

en: Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所顶尖医学院校，林佳楣的母校。
description.en: A top medical school located in Shanghai, China, and the alma mater of Lin Jiamei.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代在苏联莫斯科为中国革命者开设的大学，李伯钊的母校。
description.en: A university for Chinese revolutionaries opened in Moscow, Soviet Union in the 1920s, and the alma mater of Li Bozhao.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position of the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛是习近平的妻子。
description.en: Peng Liyuan is the wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛泽东的妻子。
description.en: Jiang Qing is the wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 韩芝俊是华国锋的妻子。
description.en: Han Zhijun is the wife of Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 卓琳是邓小平的妻子。
description.en: Zhuo Lin is the wife of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 王冶坪是江泽民的妻子。
description.en: Wang Yeping is the wife of Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清是胡锦涛的妻子。
description.en: Liu Yongqing is the wife of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 王光美是刘少奇的妻子。
description.en: Wang Guangmei is the wife of Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 何连芝是董必武的妻子。
description.en: He Lianzhi is the wife of Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 林佳楣是李先念的妻子。
description.en: Lin Jiamei is the wife of Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 李伯钊是杨尚昆的妻子。
description.en: Li Bozhao is the wife of Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄是孙中山的妻子。
description.en: Soong Ching-ling is the wife of Sun Yat-sen.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

description.zh-cn: 在2013年习近平携彭丽媛出访期间，新华网等官方媒体以“中国第一夫人”称呼彭丽媛，引发了中国的“第一夫人热”，提升了其公众形象。
description.en: During Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan's state visits in 2013, official media outlets such as Xinhuanet referred to Peng Liyuan as 'China's First Lady', triggering a 'First Lady fever' in China and enhancing her public image.

description.zh-cn: 在2013年习近平携彭丽媛出访期间，人民网等官方媒体以“中国第一夫人”称呼彭丽媛，引发了中国的“第一夫人热”，提升了其公众形象。
description.en: During Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan's state visits in 2013, official media outlets such as People's Daily Online referred to Peng Liyuan as 'China's First Lady', triggering a 'First Lady fever' in China and enhancing her public image.

description.zh-cn: 在2013年习近平携彭丽媛出访期间，《环球时报》等官方媒体以“中国第一夫人”称呼彭丽媛，引发了中国的“第一夫人热”，提升了其公众形象。
description.en: During Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan's state visits in 2013, official media outlets such as Global Times referred to Peng Liyuan as 'China's First Lady', triggering a 'First Lady fever' in China and enhancing her public image.

description.zh-cn: 由于王光美作为时任国家主席刘少奇的夫人多次出访外国，被外媒称为“第一夫人”，这引起了时任中共中央主席毛泽东的夫人江青的不满，为文化大革命期间刘少奇和王光美遭批斗埋下伏笔。
description.en: As the wife of then-President Liu Shaoqi, Wang Guangmei's frequent state visits abroad, where she was dubbed the 'First Lady' by foreign media, caused dissatisfaction for Jiang Qing, wife of then-CCP Chairman Mao Zedong. This laid the groundwork for the persecution of Liu Shaoqi and Wang Guangmei during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，时任国家主席刘少奇遭到批斗和迫害，最终含冤去世。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, then-President Liu Shaoqi was denounced and persecuted, eventually dying in disgrace.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，作为刘少奇的夫人，王光美也遭到了残酷的批斗和长达12年的监禁。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, as the wife of Liu Shaoqi, Wang Guangmei was also subjected to brutal struggle sessions and was imprisoned for 12 years.
